post.body: There's a shock, I am one foot in the grave.
hope you have thermal pants on....lol
I love Saved by the Bell. Huge fan of Kelly, plus it was a great drinking show back in the day
62 degrees. Thats a hell of a way to try and save money. I hope Friday is bring your flask to work day
I didnt describe them silly I am just starting to wonder if I put the correct ones on. Its very dark in my house....lol
What goes on in the Smith household should stay in the Smith household...lol
We lost power. Kind of interesting putting on underwear in the dark. Hope they are mine!!!
How bad is it. Its all rain out in Worcester and I just drove on the Pike and it was fine.
so what your saying is that your co-workers shed???
I am sure Kansas City is beautiful in the summertime
Funny you should ask. I just a letter in the mail from the Red Sox. Who knew I was a sought after free agent
Nothing like waking up to the sound of my boss going "your fired"
Play your cards right and arrest both in the same day and breakfast and dinner are all set
I wonder what you'd get for bail if you arrested the CEO of Hooters??
actually for a guy who makes more money in a year than I will ever see, he seemed like a genuine good guy
arrest the CEO and make a coffee and donut run part of the bail agreement.
I say it has something with you being sober....lol
usually I throw things at people who wont answer the phone. It works, trust me
meanwhile I am sitting here staring at the walls its so quiet!!!
get to work and bake!!!! If I have to I will suck it up and drink warm beer. The things I do
As long as they win they can wear pink shirts with flamingos on them
but then how will I get a new batch of cookies....lol
Hard to say. So used to looking at the other style. It'll take time to get used to it. I'm not running out for a new hat yet
I have a big hand, wonder if the oven mitt would fit?
It means your soul will burn in hell for all of eternity....lol Ok so that was just a guess
he said nasty things about you too. What the hell was in that letter....lol
Angles officially withdrew their offer. I still think the Sox are in this thing
Barney Frank at our studios. He always looks drunk!!!
you dont get any sympathy from those that have been slaving away since this morning while you were slumbering
Just start talking to yourself, then you will have perfected the crazy lady image
Why am I not surprised....lol
nice pics. Why am I not surprised you own a leopard print headband...lol. Nice candy canes in the yard too!!!
once again your geniusness shines through
awww shucks. Fine I'll go get my own coffee
I take it the chances are slim to none you'd get me a coffee while your out....lol
There was an article on Boston.com that suggested that this was a game / cover-up. So who knows??
Well that just flat out sucks!!!! Hope he's happy in Baltimore or Washington
Straight up, I would do that trade. They need to address catching eventually
If they get desperate we may get him cheaper. I would like Peavy in the rotation. I dont have faith that buckholtz will pan out
Rumor has it the Mets are close to signing Alex Cora.
wonders how much trouble I'd get in if i just took a nap at my desk???
The CEO of Dunkin Donuts visited Videolink and thankfully he brought donuts and coffee. I love this job!!!!
why does time go soooooo slow
I hate Mondays!!!!!!!!!!!!
I have spent the last 1/2 hour watching the walls and I can't leave early.
still no power at home. But what will I do with the beer in the fridge. Decisions, decisions!!!!
Office Yankee Swap today. Nothing like watching somebody get pissed cause they wound up with the gag gift. At least there's food this year
Mondays suck
snowy and cold outside....warm with football on tv inside. Care to guess where my ass is???
Tonight I ambush a house in Belmont for the Ellen Degeneres Show in the hope of making beautiful TV
